      RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder.currentEpoch(Epoch currentEpoch)
      The current epoch.
      RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder.currentRound(Round currentRound)
      The current round from the perspective of the node.
      RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder.currentTimeout(Duration currentTimeout)
      The current duration the node will wait before a round times out.
      RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder.highestCertifiedBlock(RawQuorumCertificate highestCertifiedBlock)
      The quorum certificate for the highest certified block.
      RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder.lastEpochFinalizationEntry(RawFinalizationEntry lastEpochFinalizationEntry)
      If present, an epoch finalization entry for the epoch before `current_epoch`.
      RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder.previousRoundTimeout(RoundTimeout previousRoundTimeout)
      If the last round timed out, this is the timeout certificate for that round and the highest quorum certificate at the time the round timed out.
      RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder RoundStatus.RoundStatusBuilder.roundEligibleToBake(boolean roundEligibleToBake)
      Flag indicating whether the node should attempt to bake in the current round.
